aushadha adhikariya magin merata alewi kirimata thahanam kara athi gabsa saha mathwima sandaha upayogi karaganna aushadha alewi kala rathnapura nagara madhyaye pihiti aushadha alewi salak ikuth (14) da watalu wilawun upakarana aushadha adhikariya saha rathnapura saukhya sewa adhyaksha karyala niladharin kandayamak wisin gabsa sandaha yodaganna pethi samanga ema welandasale sewakayeku athadanguwata gena atha.regu departhamenthuwen lada buddhi thorathurakata anuwa upaya duthayeku yodawa mema watalima sidu kala athara ehidi gabsa sandaha yodaganna pethi 5k adangu kad pathak rupiyal pandahak wani adhika milakata alewi karamin sitiyadi athatama alla ganimata parikshaka niladharinta haki wiya.pasuwa ema welandasala thula kala sodisi kirime di ehi sangawa thibi gabsa sandaha yodaganu labana wenath pethi warga thogayak samanga merata liyapadinchi nokala wedana nashaka aushadha saha lingika karyan sandaha yodaganu labana spre kan ha wyaja aushadha wishala thogayak athadanguwata ganimata haki wu bawa aahara ha aushadha parikshaka amith perera mahatha pawasiya.aushadha adhikariye adhyaksha waidya hemantha benaragama, rathnapura pradeshiya saukhya sewa adhyaksha waidya athula dangolla yana niladharinge upades matha aushadha parikshakawarun wana amith perera, je. pi. ke. pi්rayakumara, ji.

wagiswara pandithuma mehi pariwenadhipathi lesa aarambhaye di katayuthu kala athara mudagamuwe siriniwasasabha maha swamindrayan wahansege pradhana shishya hissalle shri gnyanodayabhidhana na himiyan 1907 janawari 01 dina sita 1955 dakwa ehi pariwenadhipathi dhuraya daramin wada sitiyeya.

“bolanda kellek wenna hadanna epa sasya.oyage aadarayata mawa bandala thiyanna shakthiyak naththam man methanin pitaman wela yanawa.man oyata aadare kala.eeth mata oone mage jiwithe ussala polawe gahana tharame aadarayak.ee shakthiya oya thula naha.puluwan kamak thiyenawa nam mata waira nokara inna.eeta passe mata samawa denna.karadarayak wunoth mata kiyanna.mata oyata yaluwek wennam”
